history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08257
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE PHILIPPINE BOXING AND COMBAT SPORTS COMMISSION AND PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Aims to strengthen professional boxing and combat sports in the Philippines and promote the development of world-class professional boxers and combatants; and establish policies related to professional boxing and combat sports, to regulate professional boxing and combat sports, and to protect the welfare of professional boxers and combatants.
ALIAS NAME : “The Philippine Boxing and Combat Sports Commission Act of 2018.”
